description: Never Again forget who the climate criminals are, starting with Siemens #StopAdani.

scripts.move-core: cp src/neverAgain.css dist/neverAgain.css && cp src/privacy_policy.txt dist/privacy_policy.txt
scripts.move-ff: cp src/manifestFirefox.json dist/manifest.json &&mkdir dist/icons && cp icons/na-48x48-optimized.svg dist/icons/na-48x48-optimized.svg
scripts.move-chr: cp src/manifestChrome.json dist/manifest.json && mkdir dist/icons && cp icons/icon16.png dist/icons/icon16.png && cp icons/icon48.png dist/icons/icon48.png && cp icons/icon128.png dist/icons/icon128.png
scripts.build-core: npm run clean && parcel build src/index.html --no-source-maps && npm run rename
scripts.build-ff: npm run build-core && npm run move-ff && npm run move-core
scripts.build-chr: npm run build-core && npm run move-chr && npm run move-core
